summary: Matthew, also known as Saint Matthew, was one of Jesus' twelve apostles. He is believed to have written the Gospel of Matthew, making him one of the four Evangelists. However, many modern scholars disagree with this traditional belief. Matthew is said to have followed Jesus and later preached in Judea and other countries. Church leaders, like Irenaeus, supported the idea that Matthew wrote the gospel that bears his name.
title: Matthew the Apostle
